definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

pinyin: hun1 qian2 cai2 chan3 gong1 zheng4

sentences.english: "And the majority were having premarital sex, over 50 percent, " says Rosenbaum.
sentences.chinese: 他們中的大多數，超過50%有過婚前性行爲。

sentences.english: Government requested to monitor into the pre-marital HIV testing project.
sentences.chinese: 政府要求將艾滋病監測納入婚前檢測項目。

sentences.english: This pre-wedding tradition is a symbol of protection and shelter for the new bride.
sentences.chinese: 這一婚前習俗象徵對新娘的保護。

sentences.english: How will you react if he asks you to sign a pre-nup ?
sentences.chinese: 如果他要你簽訂婚前合約，你會怎樣反應呢？

sentences.english: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
sentences.chinese: 婚前張開眼，婚後半閉月。

sentences.english: But those who live together before marriage are more likely to divorce.
sentences.chinese: 但是那些婚前同居的人更有可能離婚。

sentences.english: Prenups are more important for younger guys.
sentences.chinese: 婚前協議對年輕男性來說更爲重要。

sentences.english: "It's like a business prenup," Staub says.
sentences.chinese: 斯特伯形容說，“這就像企業的婚前協議”。

sentences.english: Some women have taken the initiative to protect themselves before marriage.
sentences.chinese: 一些女人在婚前就已經主動採取行動來保護自己了。

sentences.english: Upwards of 70 percent of U.S. couples are cohabiting these days before marrying, the researchers estimate.
sentences.chinese: 研究者預計，目前超過70%的美國夫婦婚前同居。

sentences.english: Only - child college students take an open view on sex and before -marriage cohabitation.
sentences.chinese: 獨生子女大學生對婚前同居和性觀念比較開放。

sentences.english: It is believed a Gemini man has a string of girlfriends before marriage.
sentences.chinese: 別人老是認爲他在婚前有一大幫子的女朋友。

sentences.english: Decide whether or not you need a prenup.
sentences.chinese: 決定好你們是否需要一份婚前協議。

sentences.english: I am personal to think it is necessary that premarital property notarize.
sentences.chinese: 我個人認爲婚前財產公證是必要的。

sentences.english: And abstinence, some say, is the last thing on Chinese teenagers' minds.
sentences.chinese: 而有人說，婚前守貞是中國年輕人想到的最後一件事。

definition: the bridegroom's side/of the bridegroom's family
the bride's side (of a wedding)/of the bride's party
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse

pinyin: hun1 qian2 cai2 chan3 gong1 zheng4

definition: (romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
trial marriage/to live together before deciding whether to marry
